title: Frank O'Connor - Short Stories, Essays & Autobiography (3 bo
description:
FRANK O'CONNOR (1903 - 1966) was an Irish writer of over 150 works, best known for his short stories and memoirs, and once deemed "Ireland's Chekhov" by William Butler Yeats.  The anchor of this collection, THE BEST OF FRANK O'CONNOR (2009), is the most generous one-volume compilaton ever published of his short stories, autobiographical writings, poetry, and essays.


The following books are in EPUB format:

* THE BEST OF FRANK O'CONNOR (Everyman's Library, 2009).  Selected and edited by Julian Barnes.

* MY FATHER'S SON (Syracuse University Press, 1999).

* MY OEDIPUS COMPLEX & OTHER STORIES (Penguin, 2005).
